text: Zdeněk Mahler (7 December 1928 – 17 March 2018) was a Czech writer, musicologist, pedagogue and screenwriter. He was born in Batelov, Czech Republic. He was known for his movies Nebeští jezdci (1968), Den sedmý, osmá noc (1969), The Divine Emma (1978), Amadeus (1984), Goya's Ghosts (2007), and Lidice (2011). Mahler died in Prague on 17 March 2018 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Czech musicians Category:Czech screenwriters Category:Musicologists
title: Zdeněk Mahler
